name: Air-Tag Bluetooth Tracker for Apple Find My, Air Tag Key Finder Rechargeable (iOS Only) iPhone Smart Wallet Tracker Card, Worldwide Tracking for Bags, Passport [Apple MFi Certified]
short_description: Quickly Locate Items with Apple Find My: Can't find your wallet? Just play a sound on Find My APP. You'll hear beeps coming from under the couch, under the bed, or under the cushions. Now there's no need to rummage around. This wallet tracker lets you track it in real time via Apple Find My—even offline

Left Behind Reminder: Rushing out and forgot your wallet? When the wallet tracker loses Bluetooth connection with your Apple device, your phone gets an instant reminder—so you never leave essentials behind.

Rechargeable Smart Tag: Forgot to charge before your trip? 1 charge = 180 days active use, so you can skip frequent battery replacements. Perfect for trips and more eco-friendly by reducing waste. (Works with Qi wireless chargers)

Built-In Speaker 80-100 dB: Within Bluetooth range(30m/100ft), tap ""Play Sound"" in the app—the key finder triggers an 80–100 dB alarm to help you quickly locate lost keys or any item hidden in corners.

IP68 Water & Dust Resistant: The tracking device withstands 30-minute submersion in up to 1.5m (16.4ft) of water and is completely dustproof—ideal for outdoor adventures like hiking, beach trips, or heavy rain. Its rugged design ensures reliable performance in harsh environments.
Privacy Protection: For data security, location data and history are never stored on the bluetooth tracker. All positioning data is encrypted and anonymized—even Apple servers can’t access your data.

Slim & Portable Design: Size: 85.6*53.0*1.7mm. With a ultra-thin size and built-in lanyard hole, the tracker card easily slips into wallets, keychains, or other discreet spots—hard to detect, always protecting your items.

name: MiTag Duo - Bluetooth Tracker for iOS or Android, Smart Tracking Tag/Key Finder/Luggage Tracker/Item Locator, Compatible with iOS Find My or Google Find Hub App, IP67 Waterproof (4 Packs)
short_description: TRACKER FOR iOS or ANDROID: The MiTag DUO is a tracker tag that can be paired with iOS Find My or Google Find Hub App. When switching between iOS and Android, you can reset MiTag and pair it with your new phone. No need to buy extra. (Note: It CANNOT be paired with iOS and Android simultaneously.)

PLAY SOUND TO FIND IT: Tap "Play Sound" on your Find My or Find Hub App to ring the item finder when you're within Bluetooth range (150m/500ft). Locate your misplaced belongings easily when they're hidden or buried beneath other stuff.

NON-STOP LOCATION UPDATES: As long as the tracker is covered by iOS or Android network, you will receive continuous location updates even if it's left behind. You can also share the tracker location with friends & family for peace of mind.

ENCRYPTED DATA SECURITY: Both iOS and Android's Find My Network is encrypted and anonymous. The data and location history of your belongings will never be stored on our item locator. No need to download unknown apps that may leak your information.

IP67 WATERPROOF & DUST RESISTANT: The MiTag Duo Bluetooth tracker is dust-resistant for daily use and safe to go with your waterproof belongings. No fear of splashes, rainy days, or a short immersion as the tag can withstand up to 30 minutes underwater at 3ft depth.
* Product Dimensions (WxHxL): 1.46" * 1.46" * 0.2" (37mm * 37mm * 5mm)
* A replaceable battery is included and lasts up to 8-12 months. (Battery life may vary due to temperatures and frequency of use.)
Reminder: The tracker is not meant for tracking a person or a pet.

name: Tile by Life360 Mate Bluetooth Tracker, Keys Finder and Item Locator for Keys, Bags and More. Phone Finder. Both iOS and Android Compatible. 1-Pack (Black)
short_description: THE EVERYTHING TRACKER: Protect lost or stolen stuff and make family life easier. Attach to everyday things like keys, water bottles, or bags
STAY SAFE WITH SOS: Discreetly trigger an SOS alert to your loved ones in unsafe situations
FIND YOUR THINGS: Ring your misplaced Tile, or track it down in the free app
FIND YOUR PHONE: Phone hiding under a cushion. Use your Tile to make it ring — even when silenced
USE WITH LIFE360: Add your Tiles to Life360 — a top family connection and safety app – to see everything and everyone on the same map
WORKS WITH iOS AND ANDROID: The free Life360 app works for all households and individuals
TECH SPECS: 350-foot / 105m Bluetooth range. Up to 3-year battery. Water resistant (IP68 rated)
GIVE THE GIFT OF FINDING: Tile is an easy and functional gift for family and friends
product_description: Easily attach the Mate to everyday things like keys, backpacks and purses — no accessories required. With a loud ring and a longer range, find what you've Tiled by ringing the device or viewing its last location on your phone. Double-press the button on your Tile to find your phone — even when silenced. Or, set up your Tile to work as an SOS button, and discreetly send an alert to your Life360 Circle in unsafe situations.

name: Samsung Galaxy SmartTag2, Bluetooth Tracker, Smart Tag Tracking Device, Item Finder for Keys, Wallet, Luggage, Pets, Use w/ Phones and Tablets Android 11 or Later, 2023, 1 Pack, White
short_description: REDESIGNED TO DO MORE: The redesigned Galaxy SmartTag2 is made so you can keep calm and keep track¹; Its design makes it easy for you to tag and carry your belongings
EASY TO USE: It's IP67-rated water- and dust-resistant², activates your compatible IoT devices³ and stays powered for up to 500 days⁴ or even up to 40% more on Power Saving Mode⁵

RELAX, YOU'VE GOT IT TAGGED: Simply register a new Galaxy SmartTag2 and get started right away with SmartThings Find; With its intuitive tracking experience, you now have a way to keep track of things you love right in the palm of your hand¹

SEARCH NEAR WHEN IT'S NOT FAR: Lose something? Switch on Search Nearby⁶ and get instructions to your item's location via Compass View⁷; If you still don't see it, just ring your Galaxy SmartTag2 to have it send out an audible signal

TAGGED & TRENDY: Cover your Galaxy SmartTag2 with a colorful Silicone Case for protection and a smooth touch – or a Rugged Case with a non-slip pattern on the side and additional bumper on the bottom⁸; Both have a carabiner ring attachment
DEVICE COMPATIBLITY: Galaxy SmartTag2 is compatible to use with SAMSUNG Galaxy smartphones and tablets⁹

name: Android Air Tracker Tag 4 Pack for Luggage Tracker Tags Works with Google Find My Device App, Bluetooth Tracker Tag Key Finder and Item Locator for Wallets, Backpack, Suitcases, Replaceable Battery
short_description: Android Smart Air Tracker Tag Tracker: It is a Google certified location tracker that can be used with Google Find Hub/"Find My Device" on Android phones (Android 9 or higher, not compatible with IOS or HUAWEI). Attach this Android tracker tag to your frequently lost items and let it help you find keys, wallets, bags, suitcases, toys etc.

Android air smart tag with precise search: Use the Google Find Hub app to easily and accurately locate items you have misplaced. Smart tags have proximity display function, which will show the exact distance (accurate to meters) to your item. Similar to AirTag's UWB technology

Find Far-away with Global Tracking Location Updates: The tag has undergone comprehensive testing by Google Labs, optimizing system and hardware integration to enhance user experience. When your item is not within Bluetooth range, you can view its whereabouts on Google Maps in the Google Find hub.If there are no Android Bluetooth devices near your lost item, it will display your location at the time of loss. In regions with a high number of Android devices, real location updates only take 2 minutes

Find Nearby Tracker Tag With Sound: Within Bluetooth range (up to 60 m/200ft), you can check the location and easily find your item by activating sound via Google Find My app. The tracking tag will ring loud enough to help you locate it.signal’strength is also directly proportional to the density of the Bluetooth signal

Share Mode and Lost Mode: You can share the Google tag with your family and friends to increase security. You can also set a lost mode, where or when you lose the smart tag, the information you set can help others find you and increase the chances of finding your tag

Easy Connction and Data security: Turn on the android tag and put it near your android phone, a pairing window will automatically pop up. The Google Find My network is encrypted and anonymous. The location data and history of your items are not stored and can't be known by Google systems, ensuring your data security

Replaceable Battery and Waterproof IP67: The google tags comes with a replaceable battery without worrying about the power off(Battery life may vary due to temperatures and frequency of use). You can rely on our equipment to protect your items without the need for frequent battery replacement.The google tags can withstand splashing water, rainwater.
After sales service: If you encounter any issues with the Android tags during use, we will provide you with satisfactory assurance and service.

name: ATUVOS Air Tags-4 Pack, Bluetooth Luggage Tracker Works with Apple Find My APP (iOS Only, Not for Android), Keys Finder and Item Locator for Luggage, Backpack, Suitcases, Replaceable Battery (Black)
short_description: ✅【Find Nearby】Works with Apple "Find My" app to help find your stuff by ringing your ATUVOS air tags through the built-in speaker (loud ringing, 80-100 decibels), or just ask Siri for help. (Note: This product only supports iOS devices, not for Android)
✅【Find Far Away】ATUVOS air tags-4 pack finds items further away with hundreds of millions of Apple devices in the Apple "Find My" network. (No monthly or annual fees)

✅【Instantly Locate】ATUVOS air tags 4 pack allows you to view the location in real-time. When the distance is less than 200 feet, you can use the "Find My" app to play a sound and locate the position. When the distance is greater than 200 feet, you can use the map navigation feature in the "Find My" app to find the location of your ATUVOS air tag.

✅【Protecting Your Privacy】When using ATUVOS air tags, only you have knowledge of your item's whereabouts. Our advanced technology guarantees that your location data is encrypted and inaccessible to anyone else, not even the manufacturer has access to this information.

✅【Easy Pairing】The ATUVOS air tags-4 pack has a very easy pairing method: Open the Find My app and Bluetooth, tap “Items” and then “Add Item,” select “Other Supported Item,” and follow the in-app instructions to complete pairing. (Note: Only compatible with iOS devices, not for Android)

✅【Left Behind Remind and Lost Mode】If your ATUVOS bluetooth tracker ever disconnects from your IOS device's bluetooth connection, you'll receive instant notifications. Whether you accidentally leave your bag at the gym or forget your keys at the office, our "Left Behind Remind" will be your prompt reminder to retrieve your items.

✅【IP67 Water-resistant & Replaceable Battery】With its impressive P67 waterproof rating, this tracking device is designed to withstand water splashes, rain, and even brief submersion. ATUVOS air tag comes with a replaceable battery that lasts an impressive year. You can rely on our device to keep safeguarding your belongings without the hassle of frequent battery changes.

✅【Multiple Uses & Customer Service】ATUVOS air tags-4 pack helps you track your keys, wallet, bags, car and more. Great gifts for your family during birthdays, Christmas and any other holiday. We have 24-hour customer service, if you have any questions about the use of ATUVOS luggage tracker 4 pack, please feel free to contact us to solve it for you.

✅【Share This Item with Other】New feature in iOS 17 - You can share this item with up to 5 borrowers in the Find My app, and they can see the item's location on a map. Borrowers will not receive tracking notifications when the item moves with them. Please make sure your iOS device is updated to iOS 17.

name: Bluetooth Tracker for Android,Item Locator Works with Google's Find My Device App(Find Hub),Keys Finder and Item Locator for Wallet,Smart Tracking Tag for Keys,Suitcase,Backpack 1Pack

When you need to find the air label, just open the application and you're done. Connect this Android tracker to items that you often misplace, helping you find lost items within seconds.

【Accurate Positioning】 Use the Google Find My Device application to easily and accurately locate items that you have misplaced. The Android version of Bluetooth tracker has real-time proximity display function, which will display the exact distance (accurate to meters) to your item. The dynamic ripples of the Bluetooth luggage tracker effect help effortlessly guide you to find your items. No matter where the item is hidden in a corner, the air tag will make a loud enough sound, shortening your search time.

【Easy to use】Turn on the smart tag and Bluetooth, and a pairing window will automatically pop up on the Android phone (no manual settings required). The visual feedback of the FindMy application, such as unfolding flower icons, simplifies proximity tracking. Connect the included keychain to the pet collar, zipper, or bag to ensure that the Android tracker tag easily integrates into daily life.

【Replaceable battery】Android Tracker Tags CR2032 battery can last for 8-12 months and can be replaced by users (battery life varies depending on usage) We have equipped the Google tracker with 1 spare batteries and 1 lanyards for you to use freely.

【Privacy Security】Smart tag for android based on Google's encrypted search for my device network, all air tag tracker data is end-to-end encrypted with no stored history Double anonymization (device+cloud) blocks third-party access, ensuring that only you control location visibility Google's system cannot access your data, so these Android tracker tags are a privacy first solution.

name: Bluetooth Tracker Tag for Apple Find My (iOS Only), GPS Tracker with Replaceable Battery, Ideal as Keys, Luggage Tracker and Wallet Tracker, Suitable for Indoor & Outdoor Use, 4-Pack Black
short_description: Track your items with ease: Our Air-tag tracker allows you to easily track and locate your items worldwide with the Find My app (compatible with Apple iOS 14.6 and above only). Easy Installation and Operation: The installation process is simple and convenient; no professional skills are required. Just stick, hang, or magnetize it on the target object, turn on your cell phone's Bluetooth, and complete the simple pairing settings through the supporting app, and it can be put into use quickly. The operation interface is simple, easy to understand, and easy for older people and children to get started

Long-Lasting Replaceable Battery： Equipped with a replaceable battery, this Bluetooth Tracker-Tag offers long-lasting performance and cost-effectiveness. There is no need to worry about frequent replacements—simply swap out the battery and continue using your tracker without interruption

Waterproof, Dustproof and Signal-Friendly: Our tracker-tag is ultra-lightweight and portable, featuring a waterproof design that withstands splashes and rain, plus durable materials for long-term protection in dusty environments. The high-elastic silicone sleeve ensures a secure, non-slip fit while allowing full signal penetration for reliable performance anywhere

Perfect for a Wide Range of Items： This Bluetooth Tracker-Tag is versatile enough to track almost anything—your phone, wallet, backpack, car, or even pet cat or dog. Its compact design and reliable performance make it the ultimate solution for keeping track of your most important belongings
